licence_overview:
Specified risk material must only be removed at slaughterhouses or cutting plants authorised by the [Food Standards Agency (FSA).](http://www.food.gov.uk/ "Food Standards Agency"){:rel="external"}

*[FSA]: Food Standards Agency
licence_short_description: Authorisation from the Food Standards Agency to remove specified risk material at a slaughterhouse or cutting plant in Wales.
overview: You need authorisation from the Food Standards Agency to remove specified risk material at a slaughterhouse or cutting plant in Wales
title: Specific risk material authorisation (Wales)
